Fireplace.name: Fireplace
Fireplace.description: You feel a soothing warmness as you approach the fireplace. A wise wizard once said: 'Three obersvations are endlessly enjoyable: Watching fire burn, watching water flow and watching others work.
Fireplace.interaction: You rummage through your pockets and find some bubblegum paper. You throw it into the fire and watch it turn to ash. Rest in peace, dear bubblegum paper.

Banner.name: Banner
Banner.description: Some rangs dangle from the ceiling. You take a moment to recognize them as the house banner. In ancient Comic Sans letters it states "Our name be Schulz".

Table.name: Table
Table.description: Within the chaos on the large wooden table you find a perfectly fine tea mug.

Mug.name: Mug
Mug.interaction: You grab the mug as it turns to you and yells "Gimme all your tea!" Seems like you're getting mugged.

Bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
Bookshelf.description: The books in this shelf seem to be very boring. Mostly computer tech stuff. A stretched out yawn escapes your mouth.
Bookshelf.interaction: You see the following books before you:

Bookshelves.name: Bookshelf
Bookshelves.description: The books in this shelf seem to be very boring. Mostly computer tech stuff. A stretched out yawn escapes your mouth.
Bookshelves.interaction: You see the following books before you:

Dust.name: Dust
Dust.description: You try to blow the dust cover off of a heavy book and find it's become solid over time.

Curiosity.name: Curiosity
Curiosity.description: You take a step towards a curiosity. The mars rover bleeps happily as to greet you.
Curiosity.interaction: You stretch out your hand and it gives you a piece of mars rock.

Curiosities.name: Curiosities
Curiosities.description: You take a step towards a curiosity. The mars rover bleeps happily as to greet you.
Curiosities.interaction: You stretch out your hand and it gives you a piece of mars rock.

Display Case.name: Display Case
Display Case.description: You see some intricate, well crafted artworks between a lot of tryhard wannabe mordern art trash.
Display Case.interaction: The display case exhibits an impressive collection of art. Your gaze glides right past it and focuses on the weird junk next to the intricate pieces. Here's what you see:

Spiderwebs.name: Spiderwebs
Spiderwebs.description: Spiderwebs give a room a certain flair.

Spiderweb.name: Spiderweb
Spiderweb.description: Spiderwebs give a room a certain flair.

Spider.name: Spider
Spider.description: Itsy bitsy spider, eating a dead fly - ripping it apart and munching with a smile

Bottle.name: Bottle
Bottle.description: 2020 German red. Sun slope. Flamboyant on the tip of your tongue, rhombus-shaped in the throat. A hint of Hubba Bubba.
Bottle.interaction: You take a sip. A large one.

VHS Recorder.name: VHS Recorder
VHS Recorder.description: It's been a while since you've seen one of those. A wave of nostalgia rolls over you as you remember the soothing rewind sound and analog artifacts on old tapes.
VHS Recorder.interaction: You press the power switch and the silver screen comes to live. Let's have a movie night! There are some tapes scattered around:

Silver Screen.name: Silver Screen
Silver Screen.description: It's called a silver screen, because back in the days it used to be made of silver. Who would've thought!

Movie Posters.name: Movie Posters
Movie Posters.description: 'Dogville', 'The Turin Horse', 'The Mill and the Cross'... That's a weird taste in movies.

Nachos.name: Nachos
Nachos.interaction: They're only half as good without cheese dip.
